channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Pardon applications are being carefully crafted with one man in mind: Donald Trump
item.description: President Donald Trump’s unconventional approach to clemency has spread hope among federal prisoners and formerly incarcerated people around the United States, prompting a wave of petitions carefully crafted to capture his attention.

item.title: Justice Department says Kilmar Abrego Garcia will face US trial before any move to deport him again
Prosecutor tells jury ‘it’s time’ to convict Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs as sex trafficking trial near end
